sub_module.name: TOPIC: NATIONAL GOVERNMENT VILLAGE ADMINISTRATION POLICY PUBLIC PARTICIPATION
sub_module.description:
THE MINISTRY OF INTERIOR AND NATIONAL ADMINISTRATION IS PLANNING TO FORMALIZE THE ROLE OF VILLAGE ELDERS BY ESTABLISHING A STRUCTURED PROCESS FOR THEIR ENROLLMENT, ADMINISTRATION AND RECOGNITION. THE POLICY WILL STRENGTHEN GRASSROOTS GOVERNANCE AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT IN KENYA. YOUR INPUT IS IMPORTANT TO ENSURE THAT THE PROCESS FOR SELECTION OF VILLAGE ELDERS, QUALIFICATIONS, RECOGNITION, AND DUTIES REFLECT THE NEEDS AND EXPECTATIONS OF THE COMMUNITY TOWARDS SERVICE DELIVERY. PLEASE TAKE A FEW MINUTES TO ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS

Instructions for Respondents

Please answer all questions honestly based on your current understanding or opinion.
If you have no opinion on a particular question, you may select “No opinion” or leave it blank (if allowed).
All responses will remain confidential and will be used solely for the purpose of improving public participation and governance.

THE MINISTRY OF INTERIOR AND NATIONAL ADMINISTRATION IS PLANNING TO FORMALIZE THE ROLE OF VILLAGE ELDERS BY ESTABLISHING A STRUCTURED PROCESS FOR THEIR ENROLLMENT, ADMINISTRATION AND RECOGNITION. THE POLICY WILL STRENGTHEN GRASSROOTS GOVERNANCE AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT IN KENYA. YOUR INPUT IS IMPORTANT TO ENSURE THAT THE PROCESS FOR SELECTION OF VILLAGE ELDERS, QUALIFICATIONS, RECOGNITION, AND DUTIES REFLECT THE NEEDS AND EXPECTATIONS OF THE COMMUNITY TOWARDS SERVICE DELIVERY. PLEASE TAKE A FEW MINUTES TO ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS

Instructions for Respondents

Please answer all questions honestly based on your current understanding or opinion.
If you have no opinion on a particular question, you may select “No opinion” or leave it blank (if allowed).
All responses will remain confidential and will be used solely for the purpose of improving public participation and governance.

fields.name: Do you agree with the government formalizing the role of the village elders
Other

dependency.question: Do you agree with the government formalizing the role of the village elders

fields.name: How should village elders be selected
Other

dependency.question: How should village elders be selected

fields.name: What are the qualifications criteria for a village elder
options: Long term resident of the village
Knowledge of local laws and customs

fields.name: Other

dependency.question: What are the qualifications criteria for a village elder

fields.name: Should village elders be recognized, if yes, indicate what kind of recognition
What are the functions of the village elders
options: Representing the village to the government

fields.name: Other

dependency.question: What are the functions of the village elders

fields.name: Which community group should qualify to be a village elder
Should village elders have a fixed term of office
Yes

dependency.question: Should village elders have a fixed term of office

fields.name: Other

dependency.question: What are the functions of the village elders

What are the functions of the village el: Representing the village to the government
formData.What are the qualifications criteria for: Knowledge of local laws and customs
formData.Do you agree with the government formali: It needs a proper plan and structure
It needs a proper plan and structure
